pastProjects.name: Complete Basement Window Renovation
pastProjects.description: A comprehensive basement renovation featuring new egress windows, improved lighting, and enhanced moisture control. This project transformed a dark, unused basement into a bright, functional living space.

pastProjects.name: Suburban Family Home Makeover
